59 namespace moveit_rviz_plugin
60 {
61 TrajectoryVisualization::TrajectoryVisualization(rviz::Property* widget, rviz::Display* display)
62  : animating_path_(false)
63  , drop_displaying_trajectory_(false)
64  , current_state_(-1)
65  , display_(display)
66  , widget_(widget)
67  , trajectory_slider_panel_(nullptr)
68  , trajectory_slider_dock_panel_(nullptr)
69 {
70  trajectory_topic_property_ =
71  new rviz::RosTopicProperty("Trajectory Topic", "move_group/display_planned_path",
72  ros::message_traits::datatype<moveit_msgs::DisplayTrajectory>(),
73  "The topic on which the moveit_msgs::DisplayTrajectory messages are received", widget,
74  SLOT(changedTrajectoryTopic()), this);
75 
76  display_path_visual_enabled_property_ =
77  new rviz::BoolProperty("Show Robot Visual", true,
78  "Indicates whether the geometry of the robot as defined for "
79  "visualisation purposes should be displayed",
80  widget, SLOT(changedDisplayPathVisualEnabled()), this);
81 
82  display_path_collision_enabled_property_ =
83  new rviz::BoolProperty("Show Robot Collision", false,
84  "Indicates whether the geometry of the robot as defined "
85  "for collision detection purposes should be displayed",
86  widget, SLOT(changedDisplayPathCollisionEnabled()), this);
87 
88  robot_path_alpha_property_ = new rviz::FloatProperty("Robot Alpha", 0.5f, "Specifies the alpha for the robot links",
89  widget, SLOT(changedRobotPathAlpha()), this);
90  robot_path_alpha_property_->setMin(0.0);
91  robot_path_alpha_property_->setMax(1.0);
92 
93  state_display_time_property_ =
94  new rviz::EditableEnumProperty("State Display Time", "3x",
95  "Replay speed of trajectory. Either as factor of its time"
96  "parameterization or as constant time (s) per waypoint.",
97  widget, SLOT(changedStateDisplayTime()), this);
98  state_display_time_property_->addOptionStd("3x");
99  state_display_time_property_->addOptionStd("1x");
100  state_display_time_property_->addOptionStd("0.5x");
101  state_display_time_property_->addOptionStd("0.05s");
102  state_display_time_property_->addOptionStd("0.1s");
103  state_display_time_property_->addOptionStd("0.5s");
104 
105  loop_display_property_ = new rviz::BoolProperty("Loop Animation", false,
106  "Indicates whether the last received path "
107  "is to be animated in a loop",
108  widget, SLOT(changedLoopDisplay()), this);
109 
110  trail_display_property_ =
111  new rviz::BoolProperty("Show Trail", false, "Show a path trail", widget, SLOT(changedShowTrail()), this);
112 
113  trail_step_size_property_ = new rviz::IntProperty("Trail Step Size", 1,
114  "Specifies the step size of the samples "
115  "shown in the trajectory trail.",
116  widget, SLOT(changedTrailStepSize()), this);
117  trail_step_size_property_->setMin(1);
118 
119  interrupt_display_property_ =
120  new rviz::BoolProperty("Interrupt Display", false,
121  "Immediately show newly planned trajectory, interrupting the currently displayed one.",
122  widget);
123 
124  robot_color_property_ = new rviz::ColorProperty(
125  "Robot Color", QColor(150, 50, 150), "The color of the animated robot", widget, SLOT(changedRobotColor()), this);
126 
127  enable_robot_color_property_ = new rviz::BoolProperty(
128  "Color Enabled", false, "Specifies whether robot coloring is enabled", widget, SLOT(enabledRobotColor()), this);
129 }
130 
131 TrajectoryVisualization::~TrajectoryVisualization()
132 {
133  clearTrajectoryTrail();
134  trajectory_message_to_display_.reset();
135  displaying_trajectory_message_.reset();
136 
137  display_path_robot_.reset();
138  if (trajectory_slider_dock_panel_)
139  delete trajectory_slider_dock_panel_;
140 }
141 
142 void TrajectoryVisualization::onInitialize(Ogre::SceneNode* scene_node, rviz::DisplayContext* context,
143  const ros::NodeHandle& update_nh)
144 {
145  // Save pointers for later use
146  scene_node_ = scene_node;
147  context_ = context;
148  update_nh_ = update_nh;
149 
150  // Load trajectory robot
151  display_path_robot_ = std::make_shared<RobotStateVisualization>(scene_node_, context_, "Planned Path", widget_);
152  display_path_robot_->setVisualVisible(display_path_visual_enabled_property_->getBool());
153  display_path_robot_->setCollisionVisible(display_path_collision_enabled_property_->getBool());
154  display_path_robot_->setVisible(false);
155 
156  rviz::WindowManagerInterface* window_context = context_->getWindowManager();
157  if (window_context)
158  {
159  trajectory_slider_panel_ = new TrajectoryPanel(window_context->getParentWindow());
160  trajectory_slider_dock_panel_ =
161  window_context->addPane(display_->getName() + " - Trajectory Slider", trajectory_slider_panel_);
162  trajectory_slider_dock_panel_->setIcon(display_->getIcon());
163  connect(trajectory_slider_dock_panel_, SIGNAL(visibilityChanged(bool)), this,
164  SLOT(trajectorySliderPanelVisibilityChange(bool)));
165  trajectory_slider_panel_->onInitialize();
166  }
167 }
168 
169 void TrajectoryVisualization::setName(const QString& name)
170 {
171  if (trajectory_slider_dock_panel_)
172  trajectory_slider_dock_panel_->setWindowTitle(name + " - Slider");
173 }
174 
175 void TrajectoryVisualization::onRobotModelLoaded(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model)
176 {
177  robot_model_ = robot_model;
178 
179  // Error check
180  if (!robot_model_)
181  {
182  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED("trajectory_visualization", "No robot model found");
183  return;
184  }
185 
186  // Load robot state
187  robot_state_ = std::make_shared<moveit::core::RobotState>(robot_model_);
188  robot_state_->setToDefaultValues();
189 
190  // Load rviz robot
191  display_path_robot_->load(*robot_model_->getURDF());
192  enabledRobotColor(); // force-refresh to account for saved display configuration
193  // perform post-poned subscription to trajectory topic
194  if (trajectory_topic_sub_.getTopic().empty())
195  changedTrajectoryTopic();
196 }
197 
198 void TrajectoryVisualization::reset()
199 {
200  clearTrajectoryTrail();
201  trajectory_message_to_display_.reset();
202  displaying_trajectory_message_.reset();
203  animating_path_ = false;
204 
205  display_path_robot_->setVisualVisible(display_path_visual_enabled_property_->getBool());
206  display_path_robot_->setCollisionVisible(display_path_collision_enabled_property_->getBool());
207  display_path_robot_->setVisible(false);
208 }
209 
210 void TrajectoryVisualization::clearTrajectoryTrail()
211 {
212  trajectory_trail_.clear();
213 }
214 
215 void TrajectoryVisualization::changedLoopDisplay()
216 {
217  display_path_robot_->setVisible(display_->isEnabled() && displaying_trajectory_message_ && animating_path_);
218  if (loop_display_property_->getBool() && trajectory_slider_panel_)
219  trajectory_slider_panel_->pauseButton(false);
220 }
221 
222 void TrajectoryVisualization::changedShowTrail()
223 {
224  clearTrajectoryTrail();
225 
226  if (!trail_display_property_->getBool())
227  return;
228  robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectoryPtr t = trajectory_message_to_display_;
229  if (!t)
230  t = displaying_trajectory_message_;
231  if (!t)
232  return;
233 
234  int stepsize = trail_step_size_property_->getInt();
235  // always include last trajectory point
236  trajectory_trail_.resize((int)std::ceil((t->getWayPointCount() + stepsize - 1) / (float)stepsize));
237  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < trajectory_trail_.size(); i++)
238  {
239  int waypoint_i = std::min(i * stepsize, t->getWayPointCount() - 1); // limit to last trajectory point
240  auto r = std::make_unique<RobotStateVisualization>(scene_node_, context_,
241  "Trail Robot " + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(i), nullptr);
242  r->load(*robot_model_->getURDF());
243  r->setVisualVisible(display_path_visual_enabled_property_->getBool());
244  r->setCollisionVisible(display_path_collision_enabled_property_->getBool());
245  r->setAlpha(robot_path_alpha_property_->getFloat());
246  r->update(t->getWayPointPtr(waypoint_i), default_attached_object_color_);
247  if (enable_robot_color_property_->getBool())
248  setRobotColor(&(r->getRobot()), robot_color_property_->getColor());
249  r->setVisible(display_->isEnabled() && (!animating_path_ || waypoint_i <= current_state_));
250  trajectory_trail_[i] = std::move(r);
251  }
252 }
253 
254 void TrajectoryVisualization::changedTrailStepSize()
255 {
256  if (trail_display_property_->getBool())
257  changedShowTrail();
258 }
259 
260 void TrajectoryVisualization::changedRobotPathAlpha()
261 {
262  display_path_robot_->setAlpha(robot_path_alpha_property_->getFloat());
263  for (const RobotStateVisualizationUniquePtr& r : trajectory_trail_)
264  r->setAlpha(robot_path_alpha_property_->getFloat());
265 }
266 
267 void TrajectoryVisualization::changedTrajectoryTopic()
268 {
269  trajectory_topic_sub_.shutdown();
270  // post-pone subscription if robot_state_ is not yet defined, i.e. onRobotModelLoaded() not yet called
271  if (!trajectory_topic_property_->getStdString().empty() && robot_state_)
272  {
273  trajectory_topic_sub_ = update_nh_.subscribe(trajectory_topic_property_->getStdString(), 2,
274  &TrajectoryVisualization::incomingDisplayTrajectory, this);
275  }
276 }
277 
278 void TrajectoryVisualization::changedDisplayPathVisualEnabled()
279 {
280  if (display_->isEnabled())
281  {
282  display_path_robot_->setVisualVisible(display_path_visual_enabled_property_->getBool());
283  display_path_robot_->setVisible(display_->isEnabled() && displaying_trajectory_message_ && animating_path_);
284  for (const RobotStateVisualizationUniquePtr& r : trajectory_trail_)
285  r->setVisualVisible(display_path_visual_enabled_property_->getBool());
286  }
287 }
288 
289 void TrajectoryVisualization::changedStateDisplayTime()
290 {
291 }
292 
293 void TrajectoryVisualization::changedDisplayPathCollisionEnabled()
294 {
295  if (display_->isEnabled())
296  {
297  display_path_robot_->setCollisionVisible(display_path_collision_enabled_property_->getBool());
298  display_path_robot_->setVisible(display_->isEnabled() && displaying_trajectory_message_ && animating_path_);
299  for (const RobotStateVisualizationUniquePtr& r : trajectory_trail_)
300  r->setCollisionVisible(display_path_collision_enabled_property_->getBool());
301  }
302 }
303 
304 void TrajectoryVisualization::onEnable()
305 {
306  changedRobotPathAlpha(); // set alpha property
307 
308  display_path_robot_->setVisualVisible(display_path_visual_enabled_property_->getBool());
309  display_path_robot_->setCollisionVisible(display_path_collision_enabled_property_->getBool());
310  display_path_robot_->setVisible(displaying_trajectory_message_ && animating_path_);
311  for (const RobotStateVisualizationUniquePtr& r : trajectory_trail_)
312  {
313  r->setVisualVisible(display_path_visual_enabled_property_->getBool());
314  r->setCollisionVisible(display_path_collision_enabled_property_->getBool());
315  r->setVisible(true);
316  }
317 
318  changedTrajectoryTopic(); // load topic at startup if default used
319 }
320 
321 void TrajectoryVisualization::onDisable()
322 {
323  display_path_robot_->setVisible(false);
324  for (const RobotStateVisualizationUniquePtr& r : trajectory_trail_)
325  r->setVisible(false);
326  displaying_trajectory_message_.reset();
327  animating_path_ = false;
328  if (trajectory_slider_panel_)
329  trajectory_slider_panel_->onDisable();
330 }
331 
332 void TrajectoryVisualization::interruptCurrentDisplay()
333 {
334  // update() starts a new trajectory as soon as it is available
335  // interrupting may cause the newly received trajectory to interrupt
336  // hence, only interrupt when current_state_ already advanced past first
337  if (current_state_ > 0)
338  animating_path_ = false;
339 }
340 
341 float TrajectoryVisualization::getStateDisplayTime()
342 {
343  constexpr char default_time_string[] = "3x";
344  constexpr float default_time_value = -3.0f;
345 
346  std::string tm = state_display_time_property_->getStdString();
347  boost::trim(tm);
348 
349  float type;
350 
351  if (tm.back() == 'x')
352  {
353  type = -1.0f;
354  }
355  else if (tm.back() == 's')
356  {
357  type = 1.0f;
358  }
359  else
360  {
361  state_display_time_property_->setStdString(default_time_string);
362  return default_time_value;
363  }
364 
365  tm.resize(tm.size() - 1);
366  boost::trim_right(tm);
367 
368  float value;
369  try
370  {
371  value = boost::lexical_cast<float>(tm);
372  }
373  catch (const boost::bad_lexical_cast& ex)
374  {
375  state_display_time_property_->setStdString(default_time_string);
376  return default_time_value;
377  }
378 
379  if (value <= 0)
380  {
381  state_display_time_property_->setStdString(default_time_string);
382  return default_time_value;
383  }
384 
385  return type * value;
386 }
387 
388 void TrajectoryVisualization::dropTrajectory()
389 {
390  drop_displaying_trajectory_ = true;
391 }
392 
393 void TrajectoryVisualization::update(float wall_dt, float /*ros_dt*/)
394 {
395  if (drop_displaying_trajectory_)
396  {
397  animating_path_ = false;
398  displaying_trajectory_message_.reset();
399  trajectory_slider_panel_->update(0);
400  drop_displaying_trajectory_ = false;
401  }
402  if (!animating_path_)
403  { // finished last animation?
404  boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(update_trajectory_message_);
405 
406  // new trajectory available to display?
407  if (trajectory_message_to_display_ && !trajectory_message_to_display_->empty())
408  {
409  animating_path_ = true;
410  displaying_trajectory_message_ = trajectory_message_to_display_;
411  changedShowTrail();
412  if (trajectory_slider_panel_)
413  trajectory_slider_panel_->update(trajectory_message_to_display_->getWayPointCount());
414  }
415  else if (displaying_trajectory_message_)
416  {
417  if (loop_display_property_->getBool())
418  { // do loop? -> start over too
419  animating_path_ = true;
420  }
421  else if (trajectory_slider_panel_ && trajectory_slider_panel_->isVisible())
422  {
423  if (static_cast<unsigned int>(trajectory_slider_panel_->getSliderPosition()) >=
424  displaying_trajectory_message_->getWayPointCount() - 1)
425  return; // nothing more to do
426  else
427  animating_path_ = true;
428  }
429  }
430  trajectory_message_to_display_.reset();
431 
432  if (animating_path_)
433  {
434  // restart animation
435  current_state_ = -1;
436  }
437  }
438 
439  if (animating_path_)
440  {
441  int previous_state = current_state_;
442  int waypoint_count = displaying_trajectory_message_->getWayPointCount();
443  current_state_time_ += wall_dt;
444  float tm = getStateDisplayTime();
445 
446  if (trajectory_slider_panel_ && trajectory_slider_panel_->isVisible() && trajectory_slider_panel_->isPaused())
447  {
448  current_state_ = trajectory_slider_panel_->getSliderPosition();
449  current_state_time_ = displaying_trajectory_message_->getWayPointDurationFromPrevious(current_state_);
450  }
451  else if (current_state_ < 0)
452  { // special case indicating restart of animation
453  current_state_ = 0;
454  current_state_time_ = 0.0;
455  }
456  else if (tm < 0.0)
457  {
458  // using realtime factors: skip to next waypoint based on elapsed display time
459  const float rt_factor = -tm; // negative tm is the intended realtime factor
460  while (current_state_ < waypoint_count &&
461  (tm = displaying_trajectory_message_->getWayPointDurationFromPrevious(current_state_ + 1) / rt_factor) <
462  current_state_time_)
463  {
464  current_state_time_ -= tm;
465  // if we are stuck in the while loop we should move the robot along the path to keep up
466  if (tm < current_state_time_)
467  display_path_robot_->update(displaying_trajectory_message_->getWayPointPtr(current_state_));
468  ++current_state_;
469  }
470  }
471  else if (current_state_time_ > tm)
472  { // fixed display time per state
473  current_state_time_ = 0.0;
474  ++current_state_;
475  }
476 
477  if (current_state_ == previous_state)
478  return;
479 
480  if (current_state_ < waypoint_count)
481  {
482  if (trajectory_slider_panel_)
483  trajectory_slider_panel_->setSliderPosition(current_state_);
484  display_path_robot_->update(displaying_trajectory_message_->getWayPointPtr(current_state_));
485  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < trajectory_trail_.size(); ++i)
486  trajectory_trail_[i]->setVisible(
487  std::min(waypoint_count - 1, static_cast<int>(i) * trail_step_size_property_->getInt()) <= current_state_);
488  }
489  else
490  {
491  animating_path_ = false; // animation finished
492  if (trajectory_slider_panel_) // make sure we move the slider to the end
493  // so the user can re-play
494  trajectory_slider_panel_->setSliderPosition(waypoint_count);
495  display_path_robot_->update(displaying_trajectory_message_->getWayPointPtr(waypoint_count - 1));
496  display_path_robot_->setVisible(loop_display_property_->getBool());
497  if (!loop_display_property_->getBool() && trajectory_slider_panel_)
498  trajectory_slider_panel_->pauseButton(true);
499  }
500  }
501  // set visibility
502  display_path_robot_->setVisible(display_->isEnabled() && displaying_trajectory_message_ &&
503  (animating_path_ || trail_display_property_->getBool() ||
504  (trajectory_slider_panel_ && trajectory_slider_panel_->isVisible())));
505 }
506 
507 void TrajectoryVisualization::incomingDisplayTrajectory(const moveit_msgs::DisplayTrajectory::ConstPtr& msg)
508 {
509  // Error check
510  if (!robot_state_ || !robot_model_)
511  {
512  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED("trajectory_visualization", "No robot state or robot model loaded");
513  return;
514  }
515 
516  if (!msg->model_id.empty() && msg->model_id != robot_model_->getName())
517  ROS_WARN("Received a trajectory to display for model '%s' but model '%s' was expected", msg->model_id.c_str(),
518  robot_model_->getName().c_str());
519 
520  trajectory_message_to_display_.reset();
521 
522  robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectoryPtr t(new robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectory(robot_model_, ""));
523  try
524  {
525  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < msg->trajectory.size(); ++i)
526  {
527  if (t->empty())
528  {
529  t->setRobotTrajectoryMsg(*robot_state_, msg->trajectory_start, msg->trajectory[i]);
530  }
531  else
532  {
533  robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectory tmp(robot_model_, "");
534  tmp.setRobotTrajectoryMsg(t->getLastWayPoint(), msg->trajectory[i]);
535  t->append(tmp, 0.0);
536  }
537  }
538  display_->setStatus(rviz::StatusProperty::Ok, "Trajectory", "");
539  }
540  catch (const moveit::Exception& e)
541  {
542  display_->setStatus(rviz::StatusProperty::Error, "Trajectory", e.what());
543  return;
544  }
545 
546  if (!t->empty())
547  {
548  boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(update_trajectory_message_);
549  trajectory_message_to_display_.swap(t);
550  if (interrupt_display_property_->getBool())
551  interruptCurrentDisplay();
552  }
553 }
554 
555 void TrajectoryVisualization::changedRobotColor()
556 {
557  if (enable_robot_color_property_->getBool())
558  setRobotColor(&(display_path_robot_->getRobot()), robot_color_property_->getColor());
559 }
560 
561 void TrajectoryVisualization::enabledRobotColor()
562 {
563  if (enable_robot_color_property_->getBool())
564  setRobotColor(&(display_path_robot_->getRobot()), robot_color_property_->getColor());
565  else
566  unsetRobotColor(&(display_path_robot_->getRobot()));
567 }
568 
569 void TrajectoryVisualization::unsetRobotColor(rviz::Robot* robot)
570 {
571  for (auto& link : robot->getLinks())
572  link.second->unsetColor();
573 }
574 
575 void TrajectoryVisualization::setDefaultAttachedObjectColor(const QColor& color)
576 {
577  default_attached_object_color_.r = color.redF();
578  default_attached_object_color_.g = color.greenF();
579  default_attached_object_color_.b = color.blueF();
580  default_attached_object_color_.a = color.alphaF();
581 
582  if (display_path_robot_)
583  {
584  display_path_robot_->setDefaultAttachedObjectColor(default_attached_object_color_);
585  display_path_robot_->updateAttachedObjectColors(default_attached_object_color_);
586  }
587  for (const RobotStateVisualizationUniquePtr& r : trajectory_trail_)
588  r->updateAttachedObjectColors(default_attached_object_color_);
589 }
590 
591 void TrajectoryVisualization::setRobotColor(rviz::Robot* robot, const QColor& color)
592 {
593  for (auto& link : robot->getLinks())
594  robot->getLink(link.first)->setColor(color.redF(), color.greenF(), color.blueF());
595 }
596 
597 void TrajectoryVisualization::trajectorySliderPanelVisibilityChange(bool enable)
598 {
599  if (!trajectory_slider_panel_)
600  return;
601 
602  if (enable)
603  trajectory_slider_panel_->onEnable();
604  else
605  trajectory_slider_panel_->onDisable();
606 }
607
